duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct project site reviews to evaluate existing conditions and make recommendations for suitable access designs
Perform onsite construction oversight of the civil contractors at project locations to ensure conformity with the construction drawings and environmental permit requirements.
Provide construction oversight feedback through emails, reports, and phone calls to the Pickett Civil Department and the Client
Maintain construction redlines for incorporation into a final as-built package
Coordinate, log, and track RFIs between construction and Pickett/Client
Attend and actively participate in pre-bid meetings, pre-construction meetings, regular construction meetings, design reviews and as-built walkdowns
Assist Pickett Civil Engineering Department with the development of construction estimates and bid units for temporary matting, access roads, stabilizations, culverts and other civil infrastructure
Review engineering and permitting drawings from constructability, cost and clarity perspectives prior to issuing deliverables to the Client
Must adhere to Pickett and Client Health and Safety Policies, whichever is more stringent
Oversee and enforce contractor safety in accordance with Pickett and Client safety requirements
Ability to support other Pickett Engineering and Surveying Departments in the acquisition of field reconnaissance and data

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or acceptable equivalency (required)
